thread.title: Oscars 2017: Sports media have jokes after 'Moonlight' rallies for best picture
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Sports media have jokes after 'Moonlight' rallies for best picture

author: Tom Gatto (tgatto@sportingnews.com)
title: Oscars 2017: Sports media have jokes after 'Moonlight' rallies for best picture
text:
59am  48am EST The Oscars have a Steve Harvey moment, and the internet has a hearty laugh. 'Moonlight' wins best picture  59  59 a.m. ET 
So the Motion Picture Academy screwed up the best picture presentation in a big way early Monday. "La La Land" got the call, speeches were being made . . . needle scratch. Nah, we got that wrong: "Moonlight" was actually best picture. 
It was the greatest plot twist since . . . well, let's let the sports media folks describe it:
